actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-621.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2492, a bill to correct an anomaly in the rate of duty applicable to articles of apparel in which feathers or downs are used as filling and to extend until June 30, 1984, the duty provisions applicable to crude feathers and downs.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2492 (Tariff on articles using feathers or downs).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of H.R. 2492, a bill to correct an anomaly in the rate of duty applicable to articles of apparel in which feathers or downs are used as filling and to extend until June 30, 1984, the duty provisions applicable to crude feathers and downs.
